sen.j: 藤原忠文は天慶2年（940年）、平将門の乱鎮圧のための征東大将軍に任ぜられ東国に向かったが、到着前に平将門は討たれていた。
sen.e: In 940, FUJIWARA no Tadabumi was appointed as seii taishogun (literally, "great general who subdues the barbarians") to subdue TAIRA no Masakado's War and sent to Togoku (the eastern part of Japan, particularly Kanto region), however TAIRA no Masakado was killed before Tadabumi's arrival.

sen.j: 忠文は大納言藤原実頼の反対により恩賞の対象から外されたので、忠文は実頼を深く恨み、死後も実頼の子孫に祟ったという。
sen.e: Since Tadabumi was removed from the list of reward grants due to the opposition from Dainagon (chief councilor of state) FUJIWARA no Saneyori, he held a deep grudge against Saneyori and haunted Saneyori's descendants after Tadabumi's death.

sen.e: This shrine was erected to console Tadabumi's Goryo-shinko (a folk religious belief of avenging spirits).
